name: Swapno
description:
Swapno is an interactive VR game that lets players take on the role of the imaginary friend of a child who's had a rough life. The players accompany the child throughout their dreams, to find a treasure to give the child a sense of joy.

Made For The VRGameJam2022: https://itch.io/jam/vrjam2022

Made by:

DangerDano: https://dangerdano.itch.io/

Tanu_Luna: https://lunarorbit.itch.io/

Special Thanks to:

Fahmida Khanam Nisa, Shahida Khanam Shifa, Aler Organ, Mabry Organ, and Ada McCall
